indications:
Indications

Beta-blockers
name: LEVOBUNOLOL HYDROCHLORIDE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From Beta-blockers: British National Formulary)
Systemic absorption can follow topical application to the eyes; therefore, eye drops containing a beta-blocker are contra-indicated in patients with bradycardia, heart block, or uncontrolled heart failure. Important: for a warning to avoid in asthma see below
side-effects:
Side-effects 
(From Beta-blockers: British National Formulary)
Beta-blockers; anterior uveitis occasionally
